name: Svg Icon Font
tagline: How to convert your SVG icon into font.
body:
### How to create my own font
If you wish to create font with your own artworks - you can use [fontello](http://fontello.com) to simplify process.The only thing you need to do - prepare images in SVG format. Fontello currently support 2 vector formats:

1. SVG fonts.

1. SVG images.

Usually, other vector formats can be converted to SVG. But we will use only SVG images in this session.

### Importing SVG images
You should understand that font formats do not support all of the features that the SVG format provides. Though we try to automate the import process, sometimes it's necessary to make adjustments to artwork in order to achieve the desired result.

Here are our recommendations:

1. Remove all fills and colors. You can probably leave black fills.

1. Convert text layers into path.

### The remaining process is really simple.

1. Import your SVG images.

1. Select them (you can select multiple images by mouse click + drag).

1. Go to second tab and update CSS names if needed.

1. In the third tab, update glyph codes if needed.

1. Set font name on the left from download button.

1. Go to Settings > Advanced menu and fill development info.

1. Download your font.

### Authors and Contributors
